profile.title: Profilo ea Mosebelisi
profile.mustLogin: O tlameha ho kena ho bona litlhophiso.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Bontša ea mantlha le e fetotsoeng
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Bontša ea mantlha haufi le phetolelo
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Metsotswana pele e hlakoloa ka bohona
profile.saveError: Phoso: Ha ea khona ho boloka litlhophiso
profile.noPrivateKey: Ha ho senotlolo sa lekunutu sesebelising sena seo se ka romelloang.
profile.setBackupPassword: Beha phasewete ho enkripta bekapo ea hau:
profile.importSuccess: Senotlolo sa lekunutu se kentsoe sesebelising sena.
profile.importFailed: Ho kenya senotlolo ho hlolehile (phasewete e fosahetseng kapa faele e senyehileng).
profile.keysRotated: Para e ncha ea linotlolo e entsoe ’me senotlolo sa sechaba sa kenngoa.
profile.importKey: Kenya bekapo ea senotlolo e enkriptiloeng
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlolo sa hau sa lekunutu ha se tsoe sesebelising sena. Romela kopi e sirelelitsoeng ka phasewete ho e tsosolosa sesebelising se seng.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O ho Moralo oa Mahala — sebelisa likhetho tsa potlako tsa Letsatsi/Khoeli ka tlase. Ntlafatsa ho notlolla lihlooho tse ling.
profile.backupTitle: Lipehelo tsa Bekapo tse Enkriptiloeng le Ho Lumellanya Lisebelisoa
profile.backupDesc: Etsa likopi tsa bekapo tsa linotlolo tse sirelelitsoeng ka phasewete, ’me u tsosolose sesebelising se seng ho lumellanya.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Fifatsa ha app e sa lebisoe tlhokomelo
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ntlisetse tsebiso haeba molaetsa oa ka o kopitsoa
profile.unfollowFailed: Ho hlolehile ho khaotsa ho lata
profile.followHint: Lipale tsa bona li tla hlaha phallong ea Hao ea ho Lata haeba ba romela ka bamameli e le Balateli (kapa Batho bohle).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ho na le ho phoso karolong ena.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetisetsa mehala le melaetsa e kenang ho mohala kapa imeile ea hau e netefalitsoeng. Mehala/melaetsa e tsoang e ka bontša nomoro ea hau ea Chatforia.
profile.destinationPhone: Mohala oa moo e eang teng (E.164)
profile.destinationEmail: Imeile ea moo e eang teng

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha mongolo kapa kamore ea puisano ho qala ho qoqa

status.filesNote: Ho fihla ho 5 lifaele. Ka kameho lihora tse 24.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Kena ho hlophisa litlhophiso tsa hau.

premium.heading: E-ba Premium
premium.description: Notlolla likarolo tse matla & tlosa lipapatso.

auth.headline: Melaetsa e sireletsehileng, ea lefats’e ka phetolelo hanghang
auth.description: Ho enkriptoa ho tloha-qetellong-ho-ea-qetellong, phetolelo e tsamaisoang ke AI, melaetsa e nyamelang, le mehala ea lentsoe/video.

feature.encryption: Enkripshene ho tloha qetellong ho ea qetellong ka boiketsetso
feature.disappearing: Melaetsa e nyamelang & lirekoto tsa ho bala
feature.privacy: Lekunutu pele. Lintlha tsa hau, taolo ea hau.

auth.desktopTip: Ho desketopong? Skene ka founo ea hau ho fumana app.
auth.subhead: Melaetsa e poraefete, e enkriptiloeng, ’me e fetoleloa hanghang.
auth.tip: U ka sebelisa Chatforia sesebelisoa sefe kapa sefe — kapa jarolla app bakeng sa boiphihlelo bo botle.
auth.scanHint: Skene ho jarolla app kapa bula ka sebatli.

footer.doNotSell: Se ke oa Rekisa Boitsebiso ba Ka

press.title: Boralitaba
press.contact: Bakeng sa lipotso tsa boralitaba, re ngolle ho press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Bakeng sa lipotso tsa boralitaba, re ngolle ho press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ke molaetsa o sireletsehileng o nang le phetolelo hanghang le enkripshene ea E2E, o etselitsoeng ho nolofatsa lipuisano tsa lefats’e tse poraefete.
press.assetsText: Lologo, li-screenshot, le litšoantšo tsa sehlahisoa (li tla tla haufinyane).

careers.title: Menyetla ea Mosebetsi
careers.intro: Re sehlotšoana se ahang molaetsa o poraefete, oa lefats’e. Haeba u tsotella enkripshene, phihlello, le UX e monate, re ka thabela ho utloa ho uena.
careers.openRoles: Mesebetsi e bulehileng: Boenjiniere (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Sehlahisoa, Ts’ehetso.
careers.apply: Mokhoa oa ho etsa kopo: Re romelle CV/likhokahano ho jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Mabapi le Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ke molaetsa o sireletsehileng, o buang lipuo tse ngata ka enkripshene ho tloha qetellong ho ea qetellong, phetolelo hanghang, le mehala ea lentsoe/video. Morero oa rona o bonolo: ho thusa batho ho hokahana — ka polokeho, ka lekunutu, le ho tšela lipuo.

values.privacy: Lekunutu pele: Enkripshene ea E2E ka boiketsetso.
values.access: Phihlello ho bohle: Phetolelo ka bohona ea lipuo tse 100+.
values.control: Taolo: Melaetsa e nyamelang le lirekoto tsa ho bala ke boikhethelo.

about.howDescription: Melaetsa e enkriptoa sesebelising sa hau pele e tloha. Phetolelo, bekapo, le ho lumellanya li etselitsoe ho fokotsa seo li-server tsa rona li ka se bonang.

advertise.title: Bapatsa le Chatforia
advertise.description: Fihla ho basebelisi ba melaetsa ka libaka tse hlomphang lebitso. Re fana ka libaka tsa banner tse bonahalang haholo, sponsore, le liphatlalatso tsa ka hare. Bakena ba Premium ha ba bone lipapatso.

adsense.withPubId: Hajoale re fana ka lipapatso ka Google AdSense. Haeba u batla ho re lebisa ka Google Ads, sebelisa ID ea mohatisi {{pubId}} ’me u kōpe libaka tse laoloang lihloohong tse ka tlase. Ho na le lichelete tsa kotloloho — sebelisa foromo.
adsense.noPubId: Hajoale re fana ka lipapatso ka Google AdSense. Sponsore tsa kotloloho le tsona lia fumaneha — sebelisa foromo e ka tlase.

advertise.noPlacements: Ha ho libaka tse hlophisitsoeng hajoale. Eketsa ho ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Makhetlo a mangata a ho kena le nako e telele kahare ho UI ea puisano
why.brandSafe: Mefuta e bolokehileng bakeng sa mabitso; moeli oa makhetlo o hlomphuoang
why.sponsoredMoments: Linako tse tšehetsoang (mohl. “Qala Puisano”) lia fumaneha
why.deals: Litumellano tsa kotloloho kapa ka lenaneo la AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Kea leboha! Potso ea hau e se e rometsoe. Re tla latela haufinyane.
form.missingRequired: Ka kopo tlatsa lebitso, imeile, le molaetsa.
form.successToast: Kea leboha! Re tla ikopanya haufinyane.
form.mailtoInfo: Re bula kheli ea imeile ho romela potso…
form.messageLabel: Re bolelle ka letšolo la hau
form.messagePlaceholder: Ho lebisa, matsatsi, KPI, likhetho tsa sebaka…

legal.disclaimerStart: Ka ho romela, u lumellana le

upgrade.title: Ntlafatsa
upgrade.subtitle: Kgetha moralo o u tšoanelang: tlosa lipapatso ka Plus, kapa fumana likarolo tsohle ka Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Sethonamentse se tla fela
scheduleBanner.body: U tla khutlela ho Mahala ka

features.ringtones: Lireng tone le melumo ea melaetsa e ikhethileng
features.backups: Lipehelo tsa bekapo le ho lumellanya lisebelisoa

features.save25: Boloka ~25% ho feta khoeli le khoeli
features.sameFeatures: Likarolo tse tšoanang le tsa Khoeli le Khoeli

gettingStarted.title: Ho Qala
gettingStarted.subtitle: O mocha ho Chatforia? Tataiso ena e potlakileng e bontša tsa bohlokoa hore o sebetse ka metsotso.

alert.text: Tataiso ena e tla hola ha re tsebisa likarolo tse ncha. Haeba ho na le se sieo, re tsebise ka

section1.title: 1) Etsa ak’haonte ea hau
section1.loginText: ka ak’haonte eo u seng u e-na le eona.

section2.title: 2) Qala ho romellana melaetsa
section2.item1: Etsa DM kapa Sehlopha ’me u romelle molaetsa oa pele.
section2.item2: Sebelisa phetolelo hanghang ho qoqa ka lipuo tse 100+.
section2.item3: Leka melaetsa e nyamelang le lirekoto tsa ho bala ho Profilo → Lekunutu.

section3.title: 3) Eya pele
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = ha ho lipapatso, Premium = likarolo tsohle).
section3.item2Part1: Hokahanya lisebelisoa tse ling le ho seta bekapo e enkriptiloeng ho

account.q: Ke etsa joang kapa ke hlaphoheloa ak’haonte?
account.a: Jarolla app kapa sebelisa webe, tobetsa “Etsa ak’haonte”, netefatsa imeile/mohala. Ho hlaphoheloa, sebelisa “U lebetse phasewete”.

privacy.q: Na melaetsa e enkriptiloe ho tloha qetellong ho ea qetellong?
privacy.a: E, melaetsa le mehala li enkriptiloe ka boiketsetso. Ke uena le moamoheli feela ba ka e balang.

translate.a: Bulela “Fetolela ka bohona” ho Litlhophiso → Ponahalo & Puo. Re fetolela sesebelising moo ho tšehetsoeng, ho seng joalo ka li-API tse sireletsehileng ka metadata e fokolang.

contact.a: Re ngolle ho support@chatforia.com. Kenyeletsa li-screenshot le mofuta oa app.

contact.title: Iteanye le Rona
contact.successMsg: Kea leboha—sehlopha sa rona se tla araba ka imeile.
contact.errorSend: Ha ea khone ho romela. Ka kopo ngolla support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Leano lena la Lekunutu le hlalosa kamoo Chatforia (“rona”, “re”) e bokellang, e sebelisang, le ho arolelana tlhahisoleseling ha u sebelisa liapp le litšebeletso tsa rona. Re rala Chatforia ho fokotsa data eo re ka e fihlelang.

infoWeCollect.title: Tlhahisoleseling eo re e bokellang
infoWeCollect.account: Tlhahisoleseling ea ak’haonte (mohl., imeile/mohala) ho etsa le ho sireletsa ak’haonte.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Litaba tse enkriptiloeng (melaetsa/mehala) li E2E; re sitoa ho li bala.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Lintlha tsa tekheniki/ts’ebeliso tse kang crash logs, mofuta oa sesebelisoa, kapa analytics e akaretsang ho ntlafatsa tshebetso.

howWeUse.title: Kamoo re sebelisang tlhahisoleseling
howWeUse.provide: Ho fana le ho sireletsa tšebeletso (auth, ho lemoha spam/pefo).
howWeUse.improve: Ho ntlafatsa likarolo (boleng ba phetolelo, ho ts’epahala).

sharing.title: Kabo
sharing.body: Ha re rekise data ea botho. Re ka arolelana data e lekanyelitsoeng le ba-sebelisang ka tumellano e thata (mohl., push, analytics).

rights.title: Litokelo tsa hau
rights.body: Ho latela sebaka sa heno (mohl., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), u ka kopa ho bona, ho lokisa, ho hlakola, kapa ho tsoa ts’ebetsong e itseng. Iteanye: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Polokelo ea data & tšireletseho
retention.body: Re boloka feela seo se hlokahalang ho tsamaisa tšebeletso ’me re sebelisa tšireletseho ea maemo a indasteri. Litaba tsa E2E ha li khone ho qhaqhoa ke rona.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia ha e etsetsoa bana ba ka tlase ho 13 (kapa ho latela molao oa heno).

changes.title: Liphetoho
changes.body: Re tla beha lintlafatso mona ’me re fetole letsatsi la “E ntlafalitsoe qetellong”.

intro.body: Ka ho sebelisa Chatforia u amohela Melao ena. Haeba u sa e amohele, u se ke ua sebelisa tšebeletso.

accounts.title: Liak’haonte
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Fana ka tlhahisoleseling e nepahetseng ’me u boloke litlhaloso li sireletsehile.
accounts.itemResponsibility: U ikarabella bakeng sa mesebetsi ak’haonteng ea hau.

acceptableUse.title: Ts’ebeliso e Amohelehang
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Se ke oa romela litaba tse seng molaong, tse nyelisang kapa tse hatellang; ha ho spam kapa ts’ebeliso e ikemetseng e kotsi.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Re ka emisa/roba tšebeletso ha ho e-na le tlōlo.

yourContent.title: Litaba tsa hau
yourContent.body: U boloka litokelo tsa litaba tsa hau. U re fa litokelo tse hlokahalang ho tsamaisa tšebeletso (mohl., ho fetisa, polokelo, phetolelo).

disclaimer.title: Litemoso & boikarabelo
disclaimer.body: Tšebeletso e fanoa “joalo ka ha e le teng” ntle le tiiso. Ho fihlela moo molao o lumellang, Chatforia ha e ikarabelle ka tšenyo e sa tobang kapa e latelang.

changes.title: Liphetoho
changes.body: Re ka ntlafatsa melao ena; ts’ebeliso e tsoelang pele ka mor’a liphetoho e bolela kamohelo.

doNotSell.title: Se ke oa Rekisa kapa ho Arolelana Boitsebiso ba Ka
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ha e rekise boitsebiso ba botho. Leha ho le joalo, baahi ba California ba ka romela likopo tlasa CPRA ba sebelisa konopo e ka tlase.

cookies.title: Litlhophiso tsa Likuki
cookies.body: Chatforia e sebelisa likuki tse fokolang (mohl., saeto, tšireletseho). Ha re sebelise likuki tsa lipapatso tsa batho ba bang. Laola likuki ka litlhophiso tsa sebatli sa hau.
